en: When I saw his new hairstyle I tried hard to suppress my laughter.
zh: 看到他的新发型时，我拼命憋着笑。

en: Everyone remarked on his new hairstyle.
zh: 大家都在议论他的新发型。

en: His behavior is beneath criticism.
zh: 他的行为简直不值一提。

en: His behavior is worthy of respect.
zh: 他的行为值得尊敬。

en: His behavior was that of a gentleman.
zh: 他的举止很有绅士风度。

en: His behavior is worthy of praise.
zh: 他的表现值得表扬。

en: His behavior was theatrical.
zh: 他的举止太夸张了。

en: His behavior troubles us.
zh: 他的行为让我们很困扰。

en: His behavior shocked us.
zh: 他的行为惊到了我们。

en: His conduct was admirable.
zh: 他的表现令人钦佩。

en: His behavior was often a target of criticism.
zh: 他的行为经常招人诟病。

en: I was offended at his behavior.
zh: 他的行为冒犯到我了。

en: I was offended by his behavior.
zh: 他的行为让我很反感。

en: I can't stand his behavior anymore.
zh: 我再也受不了他的行为了。

en: His failure seems to have something to do with his character.
zh: 他的失败似乎和他的性格有关。

en: He was entirely free of his worry.
zh: 他彻底摆脱了烦恼。

en: I can hardly hold my own against his daring.
zh: 面对他的胆量，我简直招架不住。

en: Who possesses his heart?
zh: 谁赢得了他的心？

en: Who has captured his heart?
zh: 谁俘获了他的心？

en: His heart was torn by sorrow.
zh: 他的心都要被悲伤撕碎了。

en: His mind kept running on his dead child.
zh: 他满脑子想的都是他那个死去的孩子。

en: His heart was not in his work, nor did he take any pride in it.
zh: 他心思完全没在工作上，也一点儿不觉得自豪。

en: His mind was filled with happy thoughts.
zh: 他满脑子都是开心的事。

en: His heart filled with sorrow.
zh: 他心里充满了悲伤。

en: I had great admiration for his generosity.
zh: 我很佩服他的大方。

en: All his followers looked up to him as a wise and courageous man.
zh: 追随者们都视他为英勇睿智的领袖。

en: Nothing could sway his conviction.
zh: 没有什么能动摇他的信念。

en: When his food supply ran short, he had to look for a new place to live.
zh: 粮食快吃完的时候，他不得不另找住处。

en: Vitamins are absent from his diet.
zh: 他的饮食里缺维生素。

en: Calcium is absent from his diet.
zh: 他的饮食里缺钙。

en: Speaking of his eating habits, they're revolting aren't they?
zh: 说到他的饮食习惯，挺让人反胃的，不是吗？

en: His diet was abstemious.
zh: 他的饮食非常节制。

en: What he ate was very simple and humble.
zh: 他吃得非常简单朴素。

en: I besought him for a favorable answer.
zh: 我恳求他给我一个满意的答复。

en: His professional career was bankrupt.
zh: 他的职业生涯彻底完蛋了。

en: He is a lawyer by profession.
zh: 他是当律师的。

en: His job has to do with telephones.
zh: 他的工作跟电话有关。

en: He is a carpenter by trade.
zh: 他是做木工的。

en: He is a dentist by profession.
zh: 他是当牙医的。
